summary.text: The King in Yellow is a book of short stories by American Writer Robert W. Chambers, first published in 1895.

items.title: Walden

summary.text: A documentary comprising of thirteen 360 degree panning shots that gradually reveal the environments and conditions in which wood is transported from Austria to Brazil.

items.userText: Looks kinda weird. But the cover is cool, and the cinematography is a vibe.
